description: Pack 1 guaranteed cards - Player's first major deck upgrade (~7 minutes, 40,000 Essence). Teaches conditional mechanics, tradeoffs with negative effects, and introduces healing. This is the AUTHORITATIVE SOURCE for Pack 1 card stats and effects.

cards.name: Reckless Bolt
cards.flavor_text: Raw arcane power, heedless of consequence. Devastating, but leaves you exposed.
cards._design_notes: Glass cannon extreme. Teaches tradeoffs - more ATK than any starter card but defense penalty. Not strictly better than Arcane Bolt (+20 pure ATK).

cards.name: Essence Drain
cards.flavor_text: Channel your combat strength into pure essence. Wealth comes at a price.
cards._design_notes: Best rate generator (vs starter 2/sec) but with ATK penalty. Teaches generator specialization has combat cost. Creates deck composition tension.

cards.name: Fortified Stance
cards.flavor_text: Impenetrable defense through unwavering focus. Speed matters less when nothing can harm you.
cards._design_notes: Extreme defense specialist (75% better than Mystic Shield +20). Critical for Enemy 50 boss (first attacker). Minor ATK penalty for defensive builds.

cards.name: Minor Restoration
cards.flavor_text: A simple healing spell, but in desperate moments, simplicity saves lives.
cards._design_notes: First healing card in game. Simple burst heal (12% of 100 HP start). Essential for Enemy 50+ survival. Creates new deck-building consideration.

cards.name: Battle Surge
cards.ability_text: +12 ATK, +12 DEF, +1 Essence/sec. If HP < 50%: +12 ATK, +12 DEF
cards.flavor_text: Adversity sharpens focus. When wounded, your magic burns twice as bright.
cards._design_notes: FIRST CONDITIONAL CARD IN GAME. Teaches visible state conditions (HP bar always visible). Balanced hybrid always useful. When triggered (24/24/1 total) - powerful Rare. Coefficient 0.5 per conditional-mechanics.md (HP < 50% = Often True in challenging fights).
